Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: GOP \GOP\ n. [from Grand Old Party.] The Republican Party, the younger of the two major political parties in the U. S. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: GOP Group Of Pictures (video, VOBU, DVD)
GOP n : the younger of two major political parties in the United States; GOP is an acronym for grand old party [syn: {Republican Party}]
